anniversary.title: Mercurius becomes Pope John II, the first pope to adopt a new name upon elevation to the papacy.[3]
anniversary.description: Mercurius becomes Pope John II, the first pope to adopt a new name upon elevation to the papacy.[3]

app.app_title: What's in a Name? The First Papal Name Change
app.description: An interactive exploration of how Mercurius became Pope John II and forever changed papal tradition
